elements.text:
Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration's (SAMHSA's) National Helpline

SAMHSAâ€™s National Helpline, 1-800-662-HELP (4357) or TTY: 1-800-487-4889 is a confidential, free, 24/7 information service for individuals and family members facing mental and/or substance use disorders. Get referrals to local treatment facilities, support groups, and community-based organizations.

https://www.samhsa.gov/find-help/national-helpline
